directions: In a large salad bowl, toss lettuce with jalapeno peppers, tomatoes, Anaheim pepper, red onion, and cilantro. Serve.
ingredients: 1 head red leaf lettuce - rinsed, dried and torn
4 fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and sliced into rings
1/2 red onion, sliced and separated into rings
title: James' Fire Salad
